abstract.t: Workload identity systems like SPIFFE provide a unique set of security challenges, constraints, and possibilities that affect the larger systems they are a part of. This document seeks to collect use cases within that space, with a specific look at both the OAuth and SPIFFE technologies. Discussion Venues This note is to be removed before publishing as an RFC. Source for this draft and an issue tracker can be found at https://github.com/bspk/draft-gilman-wimse-use-cases.
